A simple python program to help manage ssh to places you want to be.
Built on the curses menu work from:

     https://gist.github.com/abishur/2482046
     http://blog.skeltonnetworks.com/2010/03/python-curses-custom-menu/

Usage: sshplaces.py [-h] [-f configfile]

servers.yaml is a default configfile
